climbs.name: Walk Around The Rock
climbs.fa: Mike Lewis, Rusty Lewis, Jim Fitch (Ground-up) 6/89

content.description: Nice sunny route up the buttress. Gain the 20' high pedestal from the right. Clip two bolts, then head slightly left to get small stopper placements. Straight up to last bolt. Either run it out to the anchors or step left into crack for a little more gear. Hard to tell which way was intended. Shares anchors with 'Rockwalk'. BHCC replaced hardware 8/30/14.
content.protection: Light rack   3 bolts   2 bolt chain anchors
content.location: Just N, downhill from 'The Riddle'. Climbs right off the trail up the buttress. Single 70m rope rap down 'Rockwalk'.

climbs.name: Rockwalk
climbs.fa: Rusty Lewis, Mike Lewis, Jim Fitch (Ground-up) 6/89

content.description: Mixed route with short-lived lieback crux through a bulge. Bomber small gear supplemented with spaced out bolts. Safe overall with a couple exciting runs. All hardware replaced by BHCC 8/30/14.
content.protection: Few micro cams and small nuts.   4 bolts   2 bolt chain anchors
content.location: Starts on the NW face, just at the beginning of gully. Full single 70m rope rap.

content.description: Got to stay focused as soon as you pull on.  Tricky start in finger crack leads to two bolts on upper knobby face. Traverse ridge top left to the anchors.
content.protection: Small gear to BD .4   2 Bolts   2 bolt chain anchors
content.location: Scramble up gully on the S side of Runner Rock until finger crack is spotted. Just to the right of 'Walk Around the Rock'. Single 70m rap down 'Rockwalk'.

content.description: Easily summited from gullies and chimneys on the S side. FA; Conns 9/6/55. Holds five routes, I believe.
